column1: '''Rachel Clare Reuel Tolkien''' (born [[13 February]] [[1971]]) is the daughter of [[Baillie Tolkien]] and [[Christopher Tolkien]], sibling to [[Adam Tolkien]]. This makes [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] her grandfather.

Rachel Tolkien attended the world premiere of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Musical]]'' in Toronto in 2006. She said that the "set is incredible, the costumes are beautiful," and that "[e]verything to me that is the most important, and the most moving in the book, they've gotten on the stage".<ref>{{webcite
